item.title: Make multi-persona demos fun and interactive!
item.description: Last week an idea occurred to me - we have several demos that can be shown at conferences to customers etc. But a central feature is there have multiple web apps (each can shown in one tab of a browser). How could it be possible to make the transition from one persona to another more obvious - and interactive?? Demo-hats was born! Here’s the readme from the git repo. Why would I use this?
